snippet.title: MythWars & Puzzles Official Trailer
snippet.description:
MythWars & Puzzles is an epic RPG puzzle game. 

●Creative RPG+Puzzle Gameplay
Classic RPG hero fostering combining match-3 puzzle gameplay. Conquer tons of PvE challenges in world battles and special quests.

●Unique Mythology Heroes Design
Norse, Greek, Roman, Indian and Ancient Egyptian. Hundreds of specially-designed heroes with diversified mythological art style.

●Strategy Battles
Match elemental puzzles to unlock powerful skill combinations. Hero collocations and magic items bring deeper battle strategies.

●Castle Building   
Construct a glorious castle and store strategical resource.

●Intense Alliance Events and PvP Battles
Unite alliance members to conquer evil titans, climb ladder ranking through immersive PvP fights.

Follow Us:
https://www.facebook.com/MythWarsPuzzles/
https://discord.gg/2T4gruh
